UnknownGodException - Exception in it.polimi.ingsw.exceptions
This exception is raised when a Player tries to select a GodStrategy which is not valid or because that GodStrategy has a String representation which cannot be recognized as valid.

The Player's Worker that is not the selected Worker for this turn.

Update - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.model.updates
This abstract class represents a message exchanged between Client and Server.

updateHandler - Variable in class it.polimi.ingsw.view.View
Reference to Visitor, which handles all possible updates received from server, and updates the view accordingly.
UpdateHandler - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.view
This abstract class contains the signature to force the concrete UpdateHandler to implement the methods to handle all possible updates that can be received by the View from the Server, by using a Visitor Pattern.
UpdateHandler(Controller) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.view.UpdateHandler
 
updateListener - Variable in class it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.Client
 
UpdateListener - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.network.client
This class implements the capability of listen asynchronously the client-server stream to catch Update objects sent from server to client.
UpdateListener(Socket) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.UpdateListener
UpdateListener constructor: a new instance of ObjectListenerDelegate is created in order to actually listen to the stream.
